note:
I am an artist who does intend to sell work at some point or in some fashion. You may see me trying to do this at some point. I'm also a mediocre businessperson, and a procrastinator. Thankfully if you buy prints or merchandise with my work on it from the "large collection" I've referenced, you get to work with an expert production team instead of me.

When I post my own #art here, you are free to comment and/or share it. Please don't remove signatures/identifying information or alter it though.

name: A large collection of my art can be seen at
value: https://joseph-langley.pixels.com
